description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebXApp Scrollbar by webxapp – Best vertical/horizontal scrollbars plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Scrollbar by webxapp – Best vertical/horizontal scrollbars plugin: from n/a through 1.3.0.

product.name: Scrollbar by webxapp – Best vertical/horizontal scrollbars plugin
